original_text: Noah and his wife went into the ship. His sons and their wives also went in. They all went into the ship to be safe from the deep water.
korean_text: 노아는 아들들과 아내와 며느리들과 함께 홍수를 피하여 방주에 들어갔고

sentences.original_text: Noah and his wife went into the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 노아와 그의 아내는 배 안으로 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: His sons and their wives also went in
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들들과 그들의 아내들도 또한 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: They all went into the ship
to be safe from the deep water
